item.title: Convert String to title case in Java using Streams
item.description: Title case is capitalized first character of each word. That means, we have to do this: Break at word boundaries Capitalize the first character and lowercase the others Join again at word boundaries. public String toTitleCase(String str) { final String wordBoundary = " "; return Arrays.stream(str.split(wordBoundary)) .map(it -> it.substring(0, 1).toUpperCase() + it.substring(1, it.length()).toLowerCase()) .collect(Collectors.joining(wordBoundary)); } Let’s see it in actions: Roughing It => Roughing It PRIde AnD PrejudICE => Pride And Prejudice a tale of two Cities => A Tale Of Two Cities
